title: Can’t trust this banking app
content:
1/ kept asking me to verify phone number every few days after it’s verified over and over again - unstable and unreliable to use as a banking app. i have open positions in stock which is time-sensitive, but hey let’s verify your number again because we verified it a few days back 

2/ time estimate for support is inaccurate, sometimes they just ignore your ticket. there’s no phone or email support. even if you get a chat support they would answer something irrelevant then immediately close your ticket, then you have to submit a new ticket again

3/ no clear status on rewards progress and release, which is a repetitive promotional tactic from this company

title: Please only “update” when needed
content:
I like the app but my biggest complaint is that since the app launched 2 or 3 years ago, none of the updates really improved my experience. Rather, it’s been a nuisance to constantly update the app every 2 months or so. 

This is a banking app like my wallet- I need it when I need it, and you keep putting out updates without advanced notice and a delay update function, forcing user to update often at the most inconvenient time. 

Once I tried to buy a data sim on the HSR, by the time I managed to update the app, the train already left HK zone leaving me with no data network to use in mainland.

And yet those functions most critical to users you have not added. For example FPS QR code to pay utility bills - do you realise I have to use another traditional banks app just to do this when I have a supposedly virtual bank mox app

@product team

title: Get your money taken away
content:
USE THIS APP AND GET YOUR MONEY STOLEN.
THEY ARE ONE WITH SCAMMERS. Scammers like to use this app because they can easily bypass security verification.

The scammers snatched my phone and applied for a hefty loan and transferred money to their account, and all these were executed without the need for secondary verification.

I managed to pay back earlier to avoid interest and charges, but was still charged an early repayment fee of HK$300. When I called them to waive it, they said that I need to file a police report and it will be smooth.

When I called them back after making a police report, they demanded the oral paper. I explained that the police had escalated the issue to excise and custom, so that I will only have the oral paper from excise and custom but they do not accept it. 

It’s funny how this app enables scammers to take my money, but so hard to waive a fee of HK$300, which is not even a big amount.

title: Decent but room for improvment
content: The app has been overall pretty good so far. However, there are limitations so I’ve docked a star. What I would love to see in order for me to rate higher is be the ability to be able to customise the category of each purchase in the spending tab. At the moment, multiple things fall under “other”: parking, dentist, online purchases etc. likely these vendors haven’t been categorised hence why it would be useful if we could recategorise it ourselves to get a clearer overview of our spending habits.
translatedcontent: The app has been overall pretty good so far. However, there are limitations so I’ve docked a star. What I would love to see in order for me to rate higher is be the ability to be able to customise the category of each purchase in the spending tab. At the moment, multiple things fall under “other”: parking, dentist, online purchases etc. likely these vendors haven’t been categorised hence why it would be useful if we could recategorise it ourselves to get a clearer overview of our spending habits.

content:
As entering the app is the only way to reach for those who didn’t add wallet to Phone payment application, the app failed to support when one is needed for online purchases. 

This morning, over ten thousands expected to grab a concert tickets that Mox supports, ending up a break down of the app. This event has been promoted for days even by the bank itself, yet it still fails to maintain the app traffic at all, making others failed to use the app at all.

One expects virtual banking to be convenient and effective for online services, but this app and the bank is just a disappointment.

title: Unhelpful support
content:
While the app is well designed, and the instant cash back, daily interest and swapping between debit and credit are amazing features. The support is remarkably unhelpful, several fraudulent transactions were made on my account (probably details stolen online), the response from support was simply “contact the merchant”. After another call to support they told me an investigation was started, but this appears to not have been the case. I spend hours on the phone with the merchant trying to resolve this, luckily they refunded. However I still had to ask Mox support to refund the extra cross border charges. Money stolen, and it seems like support didn’t even try to help.

Updating this after weeks; downgrading this to one star now. Their support remains unresponsive, and my only option now is to file a complaint with the HKMA. Hope that you never need any support, otherwise you’re just out of luck.
translatedcontent:
While the app is well designed, and the instant cash back, daily interest and swapping between debit and credit are amazing features. The support is remarkably unhelpful, several fraudulent transactions were made on my account (probably details stolen online), the response from support was simply “contact the merchant”. After another call to support they told me an investigation was started, but this appears to not have been the case. I spend hours on the phone with the merchant trying to resolve this, luckily they refunded. However I still had to ask Mox support to refund the extra cross border charges. Money stolen, and it seems like support didn’t even try to help.

Updating this after weeks; downgrading this to one star now. Their support remains unresponsive, and my only option now is to file a complaint with the HKMA. Hope that you never need any support, otherwise you’re just out of luck.

title: Bad customer service, bad experience
content:
本來覺得這個app都幾方便好用， 仲介紹其他人用。但12月尾發生有個不認識的人whatsapp 之後仲打電話比我,我唔認識， 當然唔接電話啦。之後Mox 給我信息, 話有人錯誤入左HKD100比我。1月7日收到Mox信件話叫我1月7日前要回覆信件，否則付上法律集任， 我見封信日子是1月4日， 我立刻當晚回覆銀行同意轉番錢比這人士。 我已經感氣憤， 點解當追債追我錢， 仲咁不合理給時限.
但我更氣憒是銀行之後嘅舉動， 仲打電話追我取回100， 及1月11日寫封掛號信比我追數。

我已經回覆他們， 點解仲追債咁不停滋擾我， 一句抱歉說話都無。 我更不明白點個不明人士知我聯絡電話， 究竟咁大間銀行點解未得我同意下， 給予這陌生人。 整件事是銀行同這陌生人嘅錯誤，點解搞到我好似犯法咁， 收到錢仲不停滋擾我？我是否要報警先可以完結這事。
translatedcontent:
Originally felt that the app was quite convenient and good, and introduced others to use. But after an unasselved whatsapp in late December, I called me after, I don't know, of course not answering the phone. Then Mox gave me the message, saying someone mistakenly entered HKD1000000. On January 7, I received a Mox letter saying he asked me to reply to a letter before January January 7, otherwise I paid the legal collection of offices. I'm angered, why is it so unreasonable to give time limits when debt chasing my money.
But I'm more breathing after the bank's move, and I also called me to get back 100, and 11 January to write a registered letter to me to catch up.

I have replied to the things, why still chasing debt so unstop harassing me, a sorry word. I am more unclear how the disgusting person knows my contact number, what such a big bank is not yet I agree, giving a stranger. The whole thing is the mistakes of banks and quirks, why did it make me look like it's illegal, receiving money and harassing me? I would not have to call the police before I could get an end.
responsecontent: Hi there, 非常抱歉你有不愉快體驗，並感謝你提供寶貴意見。如果戶口收到錯誤嘅資金轉數，得悉情況後，Mox 會有既定程序協助客人退回款項。如果你尚有任何查詢，亦歡迎電郵至care@mox.com與我哋聯絡，多謝。

title: hkt賬單
content: 無法鏈接hkt賬單_跟app上介紹都無鏈接畫面出現
translatedcontent: 無法鏈接hkt賬單_跟app上介紹都無鏈接畫面出現
responsecontent:
Hiipadwinghk ， 多謝查詢。「HKT轉賬易」適用於已啟動 Mox Credit 嘅客戶。而其正使用其他信用卡向HKT自動轉賬繳費。如你想將HKT賬單轉以Mox Credit繳付，你可以：

1. 喺Mox app內點擊Mox Card上嘅「查看詳情」，然後喺「HKT轉賬易」嘅下方按「切換」

2.授權我哋將你嘅資料 (例如香港身份證即Mox Card資料) 轉交至HKT並從HKT取得你所需嘅資料 (例如服務賬戶)

3.選擇想以Mox Credit繳付嘅HKT服務，然後按「下一步」

4.檢查並確認你的賬戶號碼，為你想切換嘅賬單，然後按「確定」

完成後我哋將向HKT提交你嘅申請， 請預留10個工作天處理。你嘅申請一經HKT接受及處理後，為你提供服務嘅相關業務單位將向你發送通知。

如有其他查詢，請透過app嘅即時短訊或語音通話同我哋團隊聯絡，可以為你提供更多協助，多謝。

title: The worst visual bank
content: They are saying that they have discounts on different platforms, but you have to verify your job and address, which other banks don’t need it. That’s so user-unfriendly to students, it’s really hard for a student to have mails with their name since they are still living with their parents. Moreover, the only way to proof you are a student is student ID card, however due to COVID-19, oversea student can’t get their student ID card, and the supporter just say you must have student ID in order to create a credit account. How am I able to get student ID from the school if i am having online lesson. Worst visual bank I ever seen.

title: 唔上唔落
content:
開完戶，入返註冊登記密碼，竟然登入失敗；撳忘記密碼又叫我入6位卡密碼，但我卡又未有，等到卡嚟又未能開app登記，因為登入唔到...

剷app再下載再登入，開頭問我有冇申請過，仲入過一次密碼，以登記呢部device用呢個app，明明係成功輸入（因為跳到去下個step入一次性即時密碼），但登記完後，再度入密碼登入又係失敗...

最後都要打電話去CS...
translatedcontent:
After opening an account, entered the registration password, even logged in failure; click the forgot password and ask me to enter 6 digits password, but I card is not yet, wait until the card to come and can not open the app to register, because can not login ...

The swagf download and login again, at first asked me if I had applied, and entered the password once, to register for this device with this app, despite the successful entry (because jumping to the next step into a one-time instant password), But after registration, it's a failure to log in again...

In the end, I had to call CS...

為防止類似事件再次發生，我哋已在後台流程中加強驗証月結單嘅準確性。我哋再次因事件對客戶造成不便衷心致歉，感謝你嘅體諒。而對於受影響嘅客戶，Mox已經逐一作出聯絡並跟進。

title: Replace SC Mobile already
content: Much slicker design than traditional banking apps like your parent SC Mobile. One minor point: in the onboarding journey I was asked to type my preferred name, I thought that name would be printed out on the card. Like AE card. So when it asked me if I prefer “Tony Chan” or “Chan Tony”, obviously I chose the former. But then I realized the printed name is based on my hkid card, so the name on my card is now “Tai Man T Chan”. That’s worse than “Chan Tai Man T” in other banks. Hope you modify the illustration based on how most HK ppl’s name are structured.

title: Mobile banking best case practice
content: The banking or mobile banking space in Hong Kong is pretty much a lackluster full of buggy and user-not-friendly banking apps that don’t generally have the users in mind. HKMA VB initiative has finally brought new players in the industry to challenge the status quo and created new opportunities. Of all the VB launches I’ve seen so far this year, Mox Bank is definitely the cream of the crop in terms of features (e.g. 1% interest, cash back, all-in-one debit/credit card, etc.) and customer experience (e.g. phased rollout to avoid queuing time). Kudos to the Mox team for the amazing work and keep it up!
translatedcontent: The banking or mobile banking space in Hong Kong is pretty much a lackluster full of buggy and user-not-friendly banking apps that don’t generally have the users in mind. HKMA VB initiative has finally brought new players in the industry to challenge the status quo and created new opportunities. Of all the VB launches I’ve seen so far this year, Mox Bank is definitely the cream of the crop in terms of features (e.g. 1% interest, cash back, all-in-one debit/credit card, etc.) and customer experience (e.g. phased rollout to avoid queuing time). Kudos to the Mox team for the amazing work and keep it up!

responsecontent: Hi Teddy, thank you for your message. We are now in the final stages before the official launch and that’s why you see the Mox app on Google Play Store. Don’t worry, we’ll soon be sending out email inviting participants to download our Mox app, so make sure to keep an eye on that email. Sorry to have kept you waiting, your patience is appreciated.
